name: Child's Pose
description: Use this pose to rest and refocus before continuing to next pose. It gently stretches back, shoulders and neck.

name: Downward-Facing Dog
description: This pose strengthens the arms, shoulders and back while stretching the hamstrings, calves and arches of your feet.

name: Plank Pose
description: A commonly seen exercise, plank helps build strength in the core, shoulders, arms and legs.

name: Tree Pose
description: Beyond helping improve your balance, it can also strengthen your core, ankles, calves, thighs and spine.

name: Bridge Pose
description: This is a back-bending pose that stretches the muscles of the chest, back and neck.

name: Corpse Pose
description: It allows for a moment of relaxation, but some people find it difficult to stay still in this pose.
